article.title: NetCentrics to Support Army Information Technology Agency
article.text: NetCentrics Corp., Herndon, Virginia, was awarded an $18,062,724 firm-fixed-price, incrementally-funded contract with options for information technology support to the Army Information Technology Agency, Washington, D.C., with an estimated completion date of Aug. 29, 2018. Bids were solicited via the Internet with four received. Fiscal 2015 operations and maintenance (Army) funds in the amount of $11,440,763 were obligated at the time of the award. Army Contracting Command, Rock Island Arsenal, Illinois, is the contracting activity (W52P1J-15-F-4021).
